name: Fédération des fabricants d'ingrédients cosmétiques et de tensio-actifs
membership:
Ingrecos is the French branch of EFfCI, European Federation for Cosmetic Ingredients.
Aspa is the French branch of CESIO, European Committee of Organic Surfactants and their Intermediates.
goal:
Aspa-Ingrecos represent the French manufacturers of cosmetic ingredients and surfactants (major suppliers and many small and medium sized enterprises, SME).

Aspa-Ingrecos advocates the collective interests :
- Represents its members towards Public Authorities,
- Assists its members in developing their business and its full potential
interests: Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Nagoya Protocol, Endocrine disruptors, Nanomaterials, Reach 2018, Cosmetic regulation and cosmetic ingredients.....
